name: Growing (SorenWagner, T-ruth, Drapenot)
description:
This game was created at the Ubisoft Game Jam 2021. The theme is chain reactions.

The team behind Growing:

Producer Soren Wagner 3D/Tech Artist Patrice FreudigerTechnical DesignerDaniel Rieder2D & 3D Artist / Audio ComposerSara KindschusDeveloperSinan Ermiş
